function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction in energy consumption in health centers","Impact":"Potential impact on the operational capability of health centers","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of energy consumption and backup power systems","Technologies":"Energy monitoring systems, renewable energy sources","People":"Health center staff, patients","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Increase in energy consumption in buildings","Impact":"Higher operational costs and potential strains on energy resources","Mitigation":"Investigate the cause of energy increase and implement energy-efficient measures","Technologies":"Energy auditing systems, energy-efficient appliances","People":"Building owners, facility managers","Owner":"Building owners, facility management team"},{"Description":"Zero energy consumption in some buildings","Impact":"Disruption of services due to power supply deactivation","Mitigation":"Regular checks on power supply and backup systems, prompt response to power supply issues","Technologies":"Backup power systems, power supply monitoring tools","People":"Building occupants, facility management team","Owner":"Facility management team"}]}
